caption.p: Interaction of RYSV M protein with a homolog of Hig in N. cincticeps. (A) Schematic representation of DmHig, AaHig, and NcHig protein domains. The proteins were predicted using the InterPro and Smart websites. The protein domains of NcHig divided into three parts, CCP1, IG, and CCP2. (B) Yeast two-hybrid assay to detect the interaction of RYSV M protein with the CCP2 domains of NcHig. (C) Yeast two-hybrid assay to detect the interaction of the NcHig CCP domains with N-terminal (1-131 aa) or C-terminal (132-262 aa) fragments of RYSV M protein. (D) GST pull-down assay to verify the interaction of the NcHig CCP2 domains with RYSV M protein. GST protein was used as the control.
